page.title: 15LOVAT ESTATES
page.content: Beaufort Castle,in the north east of this block is the family seat of Simon Fraser,Lord Lovat,and much of the land in the Kiltarlity area is owned by Lovat Estates.In all the estates cover a total area of 25000 ha.,much of which lies to the west and south of this block.The estates provide employment for many local people in a variety of jobs mainly connected with farming and sporting interests such as salmon fishing in the River Beauly and game shooting.Most of the best arable land of the area is let to tennant farmers and the Forestry Commission control almost all the commercial woodland,but the estate's Home Farm, near the castle,is used for breeding cattle which are exported world wide as breeding stock.Hereford,Simmental and Angus cattle form the main stock. Barley is also grown at Home Farm.
